fields.physical_description:
Details of parts taken from the booklet of instructions of B 438-1994. 
1. box lid; card covered with dark grey paper; on the top is a label of paper printed in colours to show the title; set number; maker's mark; BREVETE EN FRANCE ET A L'ETRANGER and an illustration of a crane; inside is a second illustration showing two boys in sailor suits playing with the kit. Except for the set number the labels are the same as B438-1994. 
2. box base; wood covered with dark grey paper 
3,4. box inserts; card covered with red paper; each has two red cloth lift tags. On to these are attached with metal parts; many by means of a paper clip fastening. 
5. booklet of instructions is actually for set 1; not 3A. It is published in French and show both photographs and illustrations together with the list of pieces needed for each constructions. Buff cover and pages. Attached to the lower insert card from top to bottom; left to right are the following: two raised plates - TAVOLETTE DI METALLO RIPIEGATE 10/2; 100x50mm one flat plate - TAVOLETTE DI METALLO NON RIPIEGATE 11/2 100x50mm two wheels; painted black - RUOLE DI TRANSMISSIONE 8/50; 50mm diam two `ladders' each formed from two lengths ASSI 7/150; 150mm; four conical ring on each length - ANELLI
CONICI 4; seven tubes - TUBETTI 13/2; 12mm; one T junction - PEZZI T 1; two L junctions - PEZZI AD ANGOLO L 2; one I junction - PEZZI I 3; and
8 bars - BARRETTE 12; 45mm two solid tubes drilled with screw threads - SOPPORTI 9/1 attached over a disc - DISCHI 9/3 and held in place by a square headed screw - VITI QUADRANGOLARI 9/2. two I junctions - PEZZI I 3 length of chain painted black - CATENA PER DRAGA 61 X junction painted black - CROCE 27 four wheels; painted black - RUOTE DI TRANSMISSIONE 8/20; 20mm one hook; black - GANCIO PER CATENA 40 or GANCI PER DETTE 55 one L junction - PEZZI AD ANGOLO L 2 one pulley - PULEGGIE PER GRU 43 two flat plates - TAVOLETTE DI METALLO NON RIPIEGATE 11/1; 50x50 one raised plate - TAVOLETTE DI METALLO RIPIEGATE 10/1; 50x50mm 
In the centre held in a fitting stapled to the inserts are the following
lengths and pieces one length - ASSI 7/750; 750mm; attached are two rings - ANELLI D'ARRESTO 5 and 6 conical rings - ANELLI CONICI 4 one length with screw thread - ASSI A VITE 6/150; 150mm two lengths - ASSI 7/120; 120mm; attached to one are 5 conical rings - ANELLI CONICI 4 two lengths - ASSI A VITE 6/80; 80mm two lengths - ASSI 7/75; 75mm two lengths - ASSI 7/60; 60mm two lengths - ASSI 7/50; 50mm one arc - ASSI CURVE 25/1; D72mm one arc - ASSI CURVE 25/2; D108mm 
Top insert has the following attached: two raised plates - TAVOLETTE DI METALLO RIPIEGATE 10/1; 50x50mm two raised plates - TAVOLETTE DI METALLO RIPIEGATE 10/2; 100x50mm four wheels; painted black - RUOTE DI TRANSMISSIONE; 8/30; 30mm d. two wheels; painted black - PULEGGIE PER SEGA A NASTRO 24 one emery disc - DISCO SMERIGLIO 17 one whet stone covered with leather - DISCO PER AFFILARE (RICOPERTO DI CUOIO) 16 two springs coiled around card frames which are attached to the insert - CORDA DI TRANSMISSIONE 21/1 and 21/2; one 1.6mm di spessore and the other 2mm di spessore ladder *not fully attached to the insert* formed from two lengths
- ASSI 7/100; 100mm; two conical rings - ANELLI CONICI 4; two rings - ANELLI D'ARRESTO 5; four L junctions - PEZZI AD ANGOLO L 2; and 20
bars - BARRETTE 12 attached through holes in a fitting stapled to the insert are the following: one length - ASSI 7/75; 75mm two lengths - ASSI 7/60; 60mm six lengths - ASSI A VITE 6/50; 50mm five lengths - ASSI 7/50; 50mm three lengths - ASSI 7/40; 40mm two lengths - ASSI 7/30; 30mm two lengths - ASSI 7/25; 25mm; on each are two rings - ANELLI D'ARRESTO 5 
*Four wheels are missing - RUOTE PER CARRI VERNICIATE; two each of 28/1 75mm diam and 28/2 90mm diam. 
*See also additional details given with B 438-1994.
fields.title: Constructional Kit
fields.materials_techniques: metal in original card and wood box
fields.history_note:
References: see notes given with B 438-1994

Bought with B 438-1994 for £280.00; premium £28.00; VAT £4.90 - total amount £312.90

Price: £312.90
fields.production_note:
Made by: Gebrüder Bing Nuremberg
Germany
